snippet: Epstein guided Boston to the 2004 World Series title, ending the team’s 86-year drought. Lester was on the title teams in 2007 and 2013. Now reunited, they’re trying to help the Cubs end a 107-year wait, but first they must overcome the Mets.
abstract: Harvey Araton On Baseball column discusses pitcher Jon Lester's joining Cubs organization and his fabled relationship with Cubs president Theo Epstein, as Cubs meet Mets in National League Championship Series.
lead_paragraph: Epstein guided Boston to the 2004 World Series title, ending the team’s 86-year drought. Lester was on the title teams in 2007 and 2013. Now reunited, they’re trying to help the Cubs end a 107-year wait, but first they must overcome the Mets.

headline.print_headline: 2 Red Sox Magicians Try Another Exorcism
headline.main: Theo Epstein, a Former Red Sox Magician, Tries Another Exorcism With Cubs
